title.narrative: Al 2024, las gobernaciones y municipios contaran con las capacidades y herramientas para dise?ar, implementar y gestionar planes,programas o iniciativas con enfoque de gestion basado en resultados y espacios de participacion para disminuir las brechas ydesigualdades sociales que experimenta la ni?ez y la adolescencia.

description.narrative: The Child-Friendly Municipalities initiative fostered the development of 12 local government child-sensitive plans and tools to support adolescent participation. Moreover, sub-national WASH governance and management capacities increased through the implementation of a WASH toolkit and enhanced monitoring mechanisms of SENASA to provide adequate technical support to local water and sanitation boards. | Status:Met | As-of Date:13/01/2022

title.narrative: Development of a mechanism for the participation of adolescents, promoting social control and enforcement for the fulfillment of commitments in favor of children and adolescents, such as those provided for in the SDGs, the CRC and the PND, among others., Number

Within the framework of the Child-Friendly Municipalities Program, an accompaniment program for Municipalities was designed for the implementation of demonstrative experiences in the development of local Development Plans for Children and Adolescents., Number
Number of local child-sensitive plans developed(69826), Number
